thread.title: Alan abdulrehman

author: Alan abdulrehman
title: Alan abdulrehman
text: I paid full balance for number plate DAR9N I sent all the documents they have quested they keep my money for six weeks then they turned around said they can't get hold on seller then they tried to give me another number plate but I have refuse it then I made more than nine calls to get full refund at the end this is not the way to run the business if you're not sure the seller sell the numberplate you should not advertise on your website
